Name: CNDL
About the game: CNDL is an IES lighting creation toolset. Create custom IES files for your renders and video games in minutes. CNDL is free to use. If you are a professional who uses CNDL as part of your workflow, we would really appreciate your financial support in some way. Purchasing our 'Professional Use' DLC is a great way to support us!
